lom:description.lom:string: This workshop, sponsored by the Computing Research Association, is primarily intended for women who are in the early stages of an academic career at a research university (either just finishing a PhD or newly hired as faculty). It will bring participants together with women who are already established in their field. The established professionals will share their own experiences, providing practical information, advice, and support to their younger colleagues. The workshop will impart the basic information that new faculty members need to succeed and it will provide them with opportunities to establish professional contacts with their future colleagues.

lom:title.lom:string: CRA Workshop on Academic Careers for Women in Computer Science
